test.name: CodeLiteral
test.expression:
codesystem "LOINC": 'http://loinc.org'
define private CodeLiteral: Code '8480-6' from "LOINC" display 'Systolic blood pressure'
define private CodeLiteral_A: Code { code: '8480-6', system: 'http://loinc.org', display: 'Systolic blood pressure' }
define public CodeLiteral_C: Equivalent(CodeLiteral,CodeLiteral_A)

test.name: ConceptTest
